overview_of_class:
Chemistry 210-1 treats concepts fundamental to the study of organic chemistry, including structure, stereochemistry and reactivity. The chemistry of alkanes, alkenes, alkynes and alcohols is discussed in some detail as well.

Chem 210-1 does not feature a separate laboratory course, but lectures on laboratory theory and instrumentation will be held once a week during the regular class meeting pattern.
name: Organic Chemistry
title: WCAS CHEM 210-1-01 Organic Chemistry

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Chemistry 210-1 treats concepts fundamental to the study of organic chemistry, including structure, stereochemistry and reactivity. The chemistry of alkanes, alkenes, alkynes and alcohols is discussed in some detail as well.

Chem 210-1 does not feature a separate laboratory course, but lectures on laboratory theory and instrumentation will be held once a week during the regular class meeting pattern.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Prerequisite: Grade of C- or better in Chemistry 103-0/123-0 or Chemistry 172-0/182-0 or Chem 152/162 or Chem 132/142 or equivalent transfer credit or AP 5 or IB 7 exam-based course credit.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
**Custom Course Package**

Available at:
Norris Bookstore $164.30
Macmillan $119.99
https://store.macmillanlearning.com/storefront/2017F0066-Che

Package Components:
1. Organic Chemistry, 6th Edition, Loudon and Parise, Macmillan
2. Organic Chemistry Study Guide and Solutions Manual, 6th Edition, Loudon and Parise
3. Sapling Homework (3 Quarter Access Credit) with etext for Organic Chemistry, 6th Edition, Loudon and Parise

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Suggested)
descriptions.value:
1. Organic Chemistry Study Guide and Solutions Manual, 6th Edition, Loudon and Parise (this item is optional if you are not purchasing the custom package above)
2. Molecular Modeling Kit

class_attributes:
Natural Sciences Distro Area

No separate laboratory or discussion course
